name_input module¶

class name_input.Name_Input(images, font)¶

Bases: scene.Scene

Handles title screen input

Parameters:
  • images – The images to load (clouds, background etc.)
  • font – The font to load in.
ask()¶

Blits to self.image a question to get num players and names of players.

process_input(events, keys)¶

Handles all user input and checks if valid input.

Parameters:
  • events – The events to be handled.
  • keys – The list of keys and which ones are pressed down or not.
update(display, events, keys)¶

Updates self and processes user input.

Parameters:
  • display – The window size.
  • events – The events to be handled.
  • keys – The list of keys and which ones are pressed down or not.
